summary: The Russian government hires the veterans of the Loca academia de policía (1984) to help deal with the Mafia.
cast: George Gaynes|Michael Winslow|David Graf|Leslie Easterbrook|G.W. Bailey|Christopher Lee|Ron Perlman|Claire Forlani|Charlie Schlatter|Richard Israel|Gregg Berger|Vladimir Dolinskiy|Pamela Guest|Stuart Nisbet|David St. James|Valeriy Yaremenko|Vadim Dolgachov|Robert Iannaccone|Carolyn Kelson|Nikolai Pastukhov|Olga Anokhina|Sergei Danilevich|Alexander Skorokhod|Sasha Maslansky|Oleg Groonevitch|Igor Semenkov|Andrei Vishnyakov|Konstantin Denakhin|Sergey Reusenko|Aleksandr Tyutin|Aleksandr Peskov|Mariya Vinogradova|Andrey Annenskiy|Zaven Martirosian|Julius LeFlore|Pavel Sanikov|Dmitriy Chernigovskiy|Willie Golovko|Amanda LeFlore|Michael Bolotin|Vladimir Salnikov|Andrei Bolotin|Vladimir Goryushin|Platon Gorushin|Nastia Gorushina|Pavel Ostroukhov|Natalya Pozdnyakova|Yakov Dyrda|Min Dabashinskas|Aleksandr Volkov|Yuriy Sysoev|The Chernievsky Group|Zemskovi|Elena Vorobieva|Alexander Diamandi|Yuri Yermachenkov|Michel Clerte|Michel Lavandet|Olivier Prosper|Olivier Renard|Svetlana|Lonnie Burr|Nikolay Ivanov|Allyn Ann McLerie
title: Loca academia de policía 7: Misión en Moscú
